title: Emerald & Diamond Bridal Haaram - Kalpavriksha Design
materials: Natural Zambian Emeralds (AAAA Grade). Finished with authentic Hyderabadi polish for enduring luster.
features: This stunning haaram showcases a geometric diamond pattern, meticulously set with a classic closed setting for maximum sparkle. The pendant features a Kalpavriksha (wish-fulfilling tree) inspired design, embellished with emeralds. Delicate gold beads line the edges, adding a touch of traditional elegance. Features beautiful droplet Emeralds.
colors: and vibrant green (emeralds). This classic South Indian color palette symbolizes prosperity
occasions: and grand festive celebrations. Also suitable for high-profile social events and gala dinners.
description: This haaram is a timeless investment, blending heritage craftsmanship with modern elegance. Its exceptional quality, ethically sourced gemstones, and unique design make it a true heirloom piece. The Kalpavriksha design symbolizes prosperity and fulfillment, making it an auspicious choice for milestone celebrations. Exquisite gemstone symmetry with highest clarity.
